title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Enhancing Language Education Capabilities through Flipped Learning and Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design language education content using the flipped learning model and develop at least three integrated instructional materials with technological tools.
Learners can create balanced language lesson plans considering technology, pedagogy, and content based on the TPACK framework.
Learners can propose at least two strategies to resolve technical and pedagogical challenges encountered when implementing flipped learning lessons through collaboration with peer teachers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
